title: What is this type face?

It’s almost like ITC Anna but not quite.

comments.content: No, I think that [you were correct](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110913/http:/www.houseoftype.com/view_fullfont.asp?catalogid=84107450&issingle=yes), Stephen.
